channel.title: Xml compress
channel.description: What do i compress the xmls to? 7z, gzip? etc

item.title: Xml compress
item.dc:creator: @X_Smokethis X Smokethis
item.description:
@X_Smokethis wrote:

[quote=“martinfin, post:6, topic:384514”][quote author=uberpk3r link=topic=480278.msg3519969#msg3519969 date=1299341976]

don’t compress. just simplify it…

Right click on file->
Open with archive manager(7zip)->
right click on the file in that and go to edit or open

Once you saved the file, it will save it so it’s already “compressed”.

Doesn’t work with winrar.
[/quote]

Open with 7-zip…edit and save and compress…Done![/quote]
Or just give up if you cant figure out how to compress?

Read full topic

item.title: Xml compress
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

don’t compress. just simplify it…

Right click on file->
Open with archive manager(7zip)->
right click on the file in that and go to edit or open

Once you saved the file, it will save it so it’s already “compressed”.
[/quote]

Doesn’t work with winrar.[/quote]

Open with 7-zip…edit and save and compress…Done!
